recipe.title: Smoked Salmon on Cream Cheese Toasts with Chives
ingredients: 3 slices firm white sandwich bread, toasted
6 thin slices smoked salmon (about 6 ounces total)
Accompaniment if desired: Slivered Endive Salad
instructions: Spread one side of toasts with cream cheese and top with salmon, wrapping salmon ends under toasts. Sprinkle salmon with chives and red onion and halve toasts diagonally.
Divide toasts and lemon wedges between 2 plates and serve with endive salad.
